title: The Harrowing Story of Jan Broberg Felt
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, we end spooky szn the same way it began - with a true crime story about the unbelievable life and times of Jan Broberg Felt out of Pocatello, Idaho.

The Friend Zone Live is back on the road! And this time we're taking @gettingrown along for the ride!
San Fran - December 7th
Atlanta - December 14th
Tickets: www.TheFriendZoneLive.com
Hope to see you there!

Business of the Week: MSNBC anchor, Alicia Menendez, pens her first book - "The Likeability Trap" - about succeeding while being yourself. To be released via Harper Collins on November 5th. Pre-order now https://www.harpercollins.com/9780062838766/the-likeability-trap

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Audible - Audible Original, The Baddest Bitch in the Room by Sophia Chang. In her groundbreaking audio memoir, this unsung legend of the music industry shares her fearless journey as the first Asian woman in hip-hop who managed icons from the Wu Tang Clan, A Tribe Called Quest, and more. Listen to her memoir, The Baddest Bitch in the Room FREE with a 30-day trial. Just go to https://www.audible.com/FRIENDZONEBADDEST

Hello Fresh - With Hello Fresh, America's #1 meal kit, you'll get easy, seasonal recipes and pre-measured ingredients delivered right to your door - all you have to do is cook and enjoy. For $80 off your first month of HelloFresh, go to https://www.hellofresh.com/FRIENDZONE80

Talkspace - These days, everyone knows that your mental health is just as important as your physical health. But scheduling in-person therapy sessions can be inconvenient, not to mention expensive. Thankfully there's Talkspace, the online talk therapy platform that's with you 24/7. Talkspace matches you with one of their 5000+ licensed therapists based on your preferences, because they know that therapy isn't the one-size-fits-all. Join over one million people who already feel happier at https://www.talkspace.com and use code ZONE for $100 off your first month. 

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast

Have a GREAT Day!
